channel.title: Cant trade or drop for 60 mins when u make anew acc Stops trasnferin
channel.description:
Hello i've tried google... forums, other rsps forums nd i still cant find a tutorial so that when you make a new acc you cant trade , drop or loose items for atleast 60 mins... If you can, can you please tell me the code, or give me a link to a tutorial as i couldn't find one..
Help is much appreciated

item.title: Cant trade or drop for 60 mins when u make anew acc Stops trasnferin
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

I’d rather use a tutorial… But i cant find one…

Read full topic

item.title: Cant trade or drop for 60 mins when u make anew acc Stops trasnferin
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Use java.util.GregorianCalendar to log what time their account is made at and compare it to the time they’re trading at.

Read full topic
item.source: Cant trade or drop for 60 mins when u make anew acc Stops trasnferin

item.title: Cant trade or drop for 60 mins when u make anew acc Stops trasnferin
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

That’s something worth saying. It will only make your players agitated if they can only sell or buy something for 1 hour until they can again.

Read full topic

item.title: Cant trade or drop for 60 mins when u make anew acc Stops trasnferin
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

Well you have to make it so the player can’t trade for 60 minutes when he has traded on the same ip, or it will pointless.

Read full topic
